definition: to meet violent death/to get killed
to die/to shoot dead/to reject/to fall forward/(suffix) to death
to collapse/variant of 斃|毙[bi4]/variant of 獙[bi4]
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: Once it touched the installation, it would die.
sentences.chinese: 一旦它碰到装置就会毙命。

sentences.english: Two of the bandits were killed on the spot.
Each frog produces enough of the toxin to kill 10 humans.
sentences.chinese: 一只毒镖蛙产生的毒素足以使10个人毙命。

sentences.english: Those who eat the poisoned meals would fall ill and die within days.
sentences.chinese: 那些吃了有毒食物的人先会生病，并在几天内毙命。

sentences.english: Osama bin Laden was killed with two shots, one of them hitting above his left eye.
sentences.chinese: 拉登中两枪毙命，其中一枪击中他的左眼上方。

sentences.english: Can you kill a goat by staring into its eyes?
sentences.chinese: 盯着羊眼能使羊毙命吗？

sentences.english: For he has just managed to kill the goat using nothing more than the power of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 因为他仅仅是用其意念的力量成功地使山羊毙命的。

sentences.english: If not given medical attention within a couple of hours It can be fatal to humans.
sentences.chinese: 若不在一两个小时内得到治疗的话，就可能毙命。

sentences.english: And that killing goats with psychic powers was just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 而用特异功能使山羊毙命仅仅是冰山一角而已。

definition: to lose one's life
to die/to perish
to take one's last breath/dying
to be decapitated (idiom)
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
to hit with a piercing blow
to die tragically/to meet with a violent death
to fall dead
variant of 殞命|殒命[yun3 ming4]/to die/to perish
to kill/to shoot dead
violent death (idiom); to die in a disaster/an unnatural death
to blow one's brain out
seriously injured
hit by a bullet/shot
lit. the soul flies away and scatters (idiom)/fig. to be frightened stiff/spooked out of one's mind/terror-stricken
to die by violence
